sentences.english: A few months ago I talked to you about the budget that we were preparing in the parish for the following year.
sentences.chinese: 數月前，我曾談論過堂區正在準備明年的財政預算。

sentences.english: If you open both the two windows, there will be a draught.
sentences.chinese: 如果你把兩邊的窗戶都打開，就會有一陣過堂風。
